attributes.action: create a taskforce to deal with the dangers of the internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On a daily basis we hear about problems relating to the internet, whether that be 'grooming', scams, pornography, copyright violation, hacking and lapse controls on what is or isn't discussed. Whilst freedom of speech should never be discouraged, the internet has becoming a breeding ground of much that is morally corrupt. We call upon the government to put pressure on web providers to regulate what they host and set up a think-tank to address this issue.`

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
